name: MusiKeys
description:
CURRENTLY IN DEVELOPMENT

Select a song and hit keys along to the music to stay alive in MusiKeys!  Choose a control mode and difficulty level that suits you, then try to tackle all of the available songs. Keep up a streak of notes for a score multiplier, and challenge yourself for a higher score!

 MusiKeys is still being developed, and is currently in a semi-buggy state. If you run into anything odd, feel free to let me know! Thanks, and hope you enjoy :) 

CURRENT LIMITATIONS:

~ Odd HUD on aspect ratios other than 16:9

~ Only supports OS's with support for >2 keypresses at once

~ Possible lag on slower devices
